[Postkarte LONDON 7 JU 82]
London, 64 StGeorge Square SW June 10/82
div.p:
Ich danken Sich for your letter of May 29: - I send you a Manuscript copy of the paper in the Singapúr branch of the Asiatic Society = send it back when you have copied it: I will try and get copies of Scribners Monthly – and New Quartets – I have seen the latter – Yokohaio EnglishNicht identifiziert. – a good paper – I shall be glad next December to insert a paper of yours in the Journal of the Royal Asiatic – My Book is on the „Languages of Africa“
Cust, A sketch of the modern languages of Africa, London: Trübner, 1883 (Trübner’s Oriental Series).
all that is known about them: thank you for mentioning the Grammar of Mbunda or Angela by Souza & Alves
Schuchardt, „Kreolische Studien I. Ueber das Negerportugiesische von S. Thomé (Westafrika)“, Sitzungsberichte der philosophisch-historischen Classe der Kaiserlichen Akademie der Wissenschaften. Wien 101, 1882, 889-917 (mehrere Zitationen).
I have written to Leiton for it
